rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Halami the Dextrous attacks, create X 1/1 white creature tokens that are tapped and attacking, where X is the number of colors among creatures you control.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample until end of turn, where X is the number of colors among creatures you control.
